title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Persuasive System Design-Based Mathematics for Learning Habit Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Using a learning analytics dashboard, quantitative patterns of one’s mathematics learning habits can be identified in three or more categories.
Based on persuasive system design (PSD) principles, two or more personalized strategies for improving learning habits can be developed and executed.
A project report can be completed that tracks and analyzes changes in learning habits over four weeks based on smart device log data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
